label: OpenAI
name: openAI
description: ChatGPT, image generation or text completion from prompt via OpenAI API

options.label: Generate Text Completion via text prompt
options.name: textCompletion

inputParameters.label: Text Prompt
inputParameters.name: prompt
inputParameters.placeholder: Write me a 250 words essay on fish

inputParameters.label: Text Prompt
inputParameters.name: prompt
inputParameters.description: The prompt to generate completions for

inputParameters.label: Image Description
inputParameters.name: prompt
inputParameters.placeholder: Photograph of an astronaut riding a horse
inputParameters.description: Description of the image you want to generated. The maximum length is 1000 characters.

inputParameters.label: Image Number
inputParameters.name: imageNumber
inputParameters.description: The number of images to generate. Must be between 1 and 10.

inputParameters.label: Image Size
inputParameters.name: imageSize
inputParameters.description: The size of the generated images.

inputParameters.label: Response Format
inputParameters.name: response_format
inputParameters.description: The format in which the generated images are returned.
